name: jet fighter race simulator - a jet fighter combat
name_original: jet fighter race simulator - a jet fighter combat
description:
Jet Fighter War Race is air supremacy jet fighter war chase and race game designed for racing gamers as well as shooting gamers to survive and race as air force bravo pilot in modern combat arena. Control super powered fighter jets while space racing in real jet fighter air race game and ultra combat racing. Survive against Humvees and anti air craft guns in aircraft fighter racing game dodging and racing avoiding incoming heat seeking missiles and rocket launchers.

Jet fighters include the following aircraft jets
• F-35 Lighting II Jet Fighter
• F-22 Raptor dogfighter
• Eurofighter Typhoon war plane
• F-16 Fighting Falcon Jet Fighter
• F-15 Eagle fighter jet
• Mirage 2000 jet fighter
• Dassault Rafale aircraft fighter
• Mig-21 jet fighter
• Mig-25 jet fighter
• Mig-29 jet fighter
• Su-35

If you like this game, please try other games by clicking “More from Developer” or by visiting our publisher account. And don’t forget to rate and review.
